üîå Browser Extension Required

This application requires authentication through the CB-PH Advance Autofill browser extension.

  1. Install the CB-PH Advance Autofill extension
  2. Log in to your account through the extension
  3. Click "Launch Web App" in the extension
  4. You'll be automatically redirected here with proper authentication
